Text: This is...the Cave of Piles?

Something like that. The ground is strong, so no
matter how wild you go, it should be fine.

(Digging was a real hassle thanks to that hard ground.
Still, it was fun to make different things...)

In fact, in the deepest part of this Cave of Piles―I
mean, Trials―there is hidden treasure.
Wow! Tr-Treasure?! What kind of treasure?

You will need to find that out for yourself. Can you
get it, Delta?
Mm! I can get it! I'm gonna get it!

This is not only a trial of physical strength. You
will have to use your brains too. If you don't use
your head, you aren't going to get your hands
on the treasure.
Head...is working! I will use my head properly!

(Hehehe, I'm looking forward to seeing her pure
reactions. Now let's see what seeds I've sown.)

(I don't know if this cave is exactly what she was
thinking of. I wonder how she'll react when she's
finally inside.)
Right, I'm going in!
Good luck!

Now, to follow her ever so quietly. I want to see her
reactions and help out if she needs it.
Easy peasy, easy peasy!

Right about now, she'll hit the first trial. It's a
long downward slope, so any moment now...
Huh? I stepped on something.
What?! It's coming from behind?!

Hehe, first is a classic adventurers' trap! A massive
rolling boulder!
Show me, Delta. How will you get through this trial?!

If you make a desperate dash straight down the slope,
you'll just be able to make it to a hollow in the wall.
Oh, it's just a rock.
You...aren't going to run away?
Only a lousy mutt would run from a rock!
This rolling rock is about to meet me head on!

Because I'm strong! I'm strong, so I'm not a lousy
mutt!

Ahh, she'll do that move. Crushing a large rock with
an iron fist.

Maybe this trial was a bad match for someone who
hates running away.
Haaaaah, hyaaaaah!!
She headbutted it instead of using her fists?!

Ouchy, ouchy, ouchy... I kinda expected it,
but that hurt a bit.
But I beat the rock... I used my head!
I didn't mean for you to literally use your head…

Rather than simply destroying it with an iron fist,
that headbutt made for an unexpected image...

I wasn't on the lookout for that kind of move, but
you reacted with absolute certainty to this trial.
Hmmm. I'll use my head at the next one, too.

In any case, the trials are just beginning. Next will
be a trap...there!
Huh? What's that? Sounds like insects...
*hiss*
Wah! So many snakes! They're poisonous too!
Exactly! I caught them myself, one-by-one by hand!

You have to use fire to keep them at bay or throw
some bait to distract them. This is a trap where you
need to use your head!
*rattle*
Whoooo...
Huh? What is she doing? Taking a deep breath?
AWOOOO!!!
S-So loud! She completely overpowered the snakes...
You're not wanted! Get out of here!

Oh, the snakes completely lost their will to fight...
She cleared the way.
Right. Let's keep going!

...If they ever made a movie of this, the story
would be so messy.

Viewers can only be betrayed by their own
anticipation, but you can't betray their expectations.

I am pretty full right now, so you guys can get outta
here, but I will eat you if I'm hungry on my way back.
Don't eat them. They're poisonous snakes...

It's this kind of irregular being that kills the joy
of the planner...

I chose you because I wanted to see your reactions
first-hand, so Delta, please―at the next trial give
me the reaction I expect.
